Define average number of newborn children per adult crow in Mayer Aquarium as x; F = B = 20; so x = 4 * F = 4 * 20 = 80. Define average number of newborn children per adult owl in Beverly Forest as v; so v = 3. Define average number of newborn children per adult eagle in Beverly Forest as e; so e = E + j = 27 + 3 = 30. question: What is the average number of newborn children per adult parrot in Bundle Ranch?
solution: Define adult parrot in Jefferson Circus as g; so g = 2. Define average number of newborn children per adult owl in Hamilton Farm as F; T = g = 2; so F = 4 * T = 4 * 2 = 8. Define adult owl in Hamilton Farm as D; J = F - g = 8 - 2 = 6; so D = 3 * J = 3 * 6 = 18. Define adult owl in Mayer Aquarium as X; c = D + F = 18 + 8 = 26; I = c + g = 26 + 2 = 28; so X = 4 * I = 4 * 28 = 112. Define average number of newborn children per adult crow in Bundle Ranch as f; B = X - D = 112 - 18 = 94; so f = 4 + B = 4 + 94 = 98. Define adult crow in Mayer Aquarium as C; d = f = 98; so C = 4 + d = 4 + 98 = 102. Define total number of adult animals in Mayer Aquarium as N; so N = C + X = 102 + 112 = 214. Define average number of newborn children per adult parrot in Bundle Ranch as i; so i = N - F = 214 - 8 = 206. Answer: 206.

question: What is the average number of nominations per calm road movie in Festival de Saint-Rivage?
solution: Define calm road movie in Festival Lumière de Valmont as b; so b = 3. Define futuristic sci-fi movie in Festival de Saint-Rivage as S; f = b = 3; so S = 4 + f = 4 + 3 = 7. Define average number of nominations per futuristic sci-fi movie in Festival de Saint-Rivage as N; F = S - b = 7 - 3 = 4; so N = 4 * F = 4 * 4 = 16. Define solemn period drama in Festival de Clairmont as W; Z = N + b = 16 + 3 = 19; w = Z + S = 19 + 7 = 26; so W = 3 * w = 3 * 26 = 78. Define calm road movie in Festival de Clairmont as x; so x = W = 78. Define total number of movies in Festival de Clairmont as C; so C = x + W = 78 + 78 = 156. Define average number of nominations per futuristic sci-fi movie in Festival Lumière de Valmont as K; L = C + S = 156 + 7 = 163; so K = L + b = 163 + 3 = 166. Define average number of nominations per calm road movie in Festival de Saint-Rivage as p; s = K - x = 166 - 78 = 88; so p = 4 + s = 4 + 88 = 92. Answer: 92.

question: How many elementary school does Glenfield City have?
solution: The question is difficult, so we use equations to solve it. Define elementary school in Glenfield City as x; we don't know its value yet but will find it out later. Define average number of teachers per public highschool in Brightford as Z; N = x = x; so Z = 4 * N = (4) * (x) = 4*x. Define regional medical school in Westhaven City as j; B = Z = 4*x; so j = 4 + B = 4 + 4*x = 4*x + 4. Define average number of teachers per public highschool in Glenfield City as b; k = j + x = 4*x + 4 + x = 5*x + 4; J = k + Z = 5*x + 4 + 4*x = 9*x + 4; so b = 1 + J = 1 + 9*x + 4 = 9*x + 5. Define average number of teachers per regional medical school in Glenfield City as i; P = b + Z = 9*x + 5 + 4*x = 13*x + 5; C = P + j = 13*x + 5 + 4*x + 4 = 17*x + 9; so i = C + x = 17*x + 9 + x = 18*x + 9. Define private middle school in Brightford as A; so A = i + b = 18*x + 9 + 9*x + 5 = 27*x + 14. Define public highschool in Brightford as h; so h = A + b = 27*x + 14 + 9*x + 5 = 36*x + 19. Define total number of schools in Brightford as m; so m = h + A = 36*x + 19 + 27*x + 14 = 63*x + 33. We know m = 96, so we have 63*x + 33 = 96 and we solve it through the following steps: Simplifying the equation: 63*x + 33 = 96. Move all terms to one side: 63*x - 63 = 0. Isolate the term with x: 63*x = 63. Divide both sides by 63: x = 63 / 63. Solution: x = 1. Answer: 1.

solution: The question is difficult, so we use equations to solve it. Define elementary school in Riverton City as x; we don't know its value yet but will find it out later. Define elementary school in Oakbridge City as j; E = x = x; so j = 3 + E = 3 + x = x + 3. Define average number of teachers per culinarian school in Clearwater Bay as I; T = j + x = x + 3 + x = 2*x + 3; so I = 2 * T = (2) * (2*x + 3) = 4*x + 6. Define elementary school in Ruby Bay as b; Z = I - x = (4*x + 6) - (x) = 3*x + 6; so b = 1 + Z = 1 + 3*x + 6 = 3*x + 7. Define elementary school in Clearwater Bay as k; z = b + j = 3*x + 7 + x + 3 = 4*x + 10; K = z + I = 4*x + 10 + 4*x + 6 = 8*x + 16; so k = K + x = 8*x + 16 + x = 9*x + 16. Define regional medical school in Ruby Bay as w; c = k + I = 9*x + 16 + 4*x + 6 = 13*x + 22; so w = c + x = 13*x + 22 + x = 14*x + 22. Define average number of teachers per public highschool in Riverton City as P; U = w + j = 14*x + 22 + x + 3 = 15*x + 25; so P = U + k = 15*x + 25 + 9*x + 16 = 24*x + 41. We know P = 113, so we have 24*x + 41 = 113 and we solve it through the following steps: Simplifying the equation: 24*x + 41 = 113. Move all terms to one side: 24*x - 72 = 0. Isolate the term with x: 24*x = 72. Divide both sides by 24: x = 72 / 24. Solution: x = 3. Answer: 3.

We know c = 47, so we have 4*x + 39 = 47 and we solve it through the following steps: Simplifying the equation: 4*x + 39 = 47. Move all terms to one side: 4*x - 8 = 0.
